site_story.short: Deep Space is a product-quality portfolio: a calm interface that hides scale until you need it, so the work speaks first and the reasoning reveals itself when you ask.

long_outline.title: Why Deep Space
long_outline.body: Because the work lives in invisible systems and emergent behaviors—space is the clearest metaphor for scale, gravity, and rigor.

long_outline.title: Why minimal navigation
long_outline.body: Confidence over clutter. A focused UI keeps the recruiter 10-second test intact while Deep Dive handles the details.

long_outline.title: Why resources-driven
long_outline.body: Content in JSON/MD keeps the portfolio maintainable and honest, so updates don't degrade quality.

long_outline.title: Why strict QA
long_outline.body: Polish is not optional; the definition of done includes visual, interaction, and build correctness.
